name: Mission Demolition (Panini Gaming)
description:
Title: Mission Demolition

Platform: PC

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Casual gamers

Game Overview: You control a slingshot. You see castles. You don't like those castles, so you knock them down. Oh no, there are four of them!

Instructions: Use your mouse to click on the slingshot. Direct where the ball will hit, and make sure to use the top button to change the camera view! That's it, hit some castles and get the green checkpoint!

Game Design Team: Me - Game Designer
